title: One Moto India inks pact with Reliance General Insurance to provide motor insurance
description: One Moto India Vice-President, Marketing & Sales, Aditya Reddy said the company has been strengthening its services and product portfolio. As the company moves ahead in sync with the strategy, he said the association with Reliance General Insurance is another milestone achieved.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
